content:
Intent1: (reduce_carbon_footprint)

Slot1:  amount of carbon emissions reduced

Intent2: (plant_trees)
Slot1:  the number of trees planted

Intent3:(install_solar_panels) 
Slot1: size of the solar panel installation


Intent4: (insulate_homes)
Slot1: the area of homes insulated

Intent5: (encourage_sustainable_living)
Slot1: number of people encouraged to live sustainable life style

Intent6: (advocate_for_policy_changes)
Slot1: the policy changes advocated for

Intent7: (educate_public_about_climate_change) 


Provide output in Json format.  No detailed descriptions please, concise summary.

Classify the following: "Do you know that it usually take around 20-30 years for a tree to reach full maturity? And with all the recent wild fires that have taken place in California & other locations... One should really increase the awareness among people regarding the importance of protecting nature..."
